title: Step 113

challengeFiles.name: script

tests.text: You should call the .push() method of rows in your else block.
You should pass a padRow() call as the argument for your .unshift() method.
You should pass i as the first argument to your padRow() call.
You should pass count as the second argument to your padRow() call.

description: When inverted is false, you want to build a standard pyramid. Use .push() like you have in previous steps to achieve this.
